titles.title: Good Christians All, Rejoice and Sing

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Good Christians all, rejoice and sing! Now is the triumph of our King! To all the world glad news we bring: "Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!"

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: We praise in songs of victory that Love, that Life, which cannot die, and sing with hearts uplifted high: "Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!"
